tool_description: Calculates distances between accommodation properties and points of interest, supporting multiple distance metrics and transportation modes.

property_coordinates.description: Array of latitude,longitude pairs for properties

reference_latitude.description: Latitude of reference point (search center or POI)

reference_longitude.description: Longitude of reference point (search center or POI)

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: All latitude values must be between -90 and 90, longitude values between -180 and 180.
Invalid coordinate array: property_coordinates must contain pairs of coordinates (even number of elements).
Coordinates array too large: Maximum 500 properties (1000 coordinate values) supported.
usage: Provide property_coordinates as flat array of lat,lng pairs, and reference_latitude/reference_longitude for the comparison point. Optionally set distance_unit and calculation_method.

distances.description: Calculated distances from each property to reference point

closest_property_index.description: Index of the closest property in the input array

farthest_property_index.description: Index of the farthest property in the input array

average_distance.description: Average distance of all properties from reference point
